item.title: Lecture 7: Pandas 2
item.description: Prep Point your browser to http://colab.research.google.com Open notebook 2019/ipynb/tnseq_with_pandas2.ipynb from https://github.com/nekrut/BMMB554 Introduction to Pandas : Part 2 This tutorial is heavily based on Pandas in 10 min. The original material waas modified by adding TnSeq data as examples. import pandas as pd import numpy as np %matplotlib inline Get datasets to play with %%bash wget https://nekrut.github.io/BMMB554/tnseq_untreated.txt.gz wget https://nekrut.github.io/BMMB554/ta_gc.txtdata_file = 'tnseq_untreated.txt.gz'# Just two choices for beginning of of gene field !

item.title: Lecture 6: Pandas 1
item.description: Prep Point your browser to http://colab.research.google.com Open notebook 2019/ipynb/tnseq_with_pandas.ipynb from https://github.com/nekrut/BMMB554 Introduction to Pandas : Part 1 This tutorial is heavily based on Pandas in 10 min. The original material waas modified by adding TnSeq data as examples. Get datasets to play with %%bash wget https://nekrut.github.io/BMMB554/tnseq_untreated.txt.gz wget https://nekrut.github.io/BMMB554/ta_gc.txt2019-01-28 13:53:53 (2.53 MB/s) - 'tnseq_untreated.txt.gz' saved [2012967/2012967] 2019-01-28 13:53:56 (2.96 MB/s) - 'ta_gc.txt' saved [7315570/7315570] data_file = 'tnseq_untreated.txt.gz' The first dataset lists coordinates of TA sites and counts of reads for TnSeq constructs ‘blunt’, ‘cap’, ‘dual’, ‘erm’, ‘pen’, and ‘tuf’:
